description: Smallest prime p such that 2n*p+1 is also prime.
comments: These are the primes arising in A051899.
example: a(29)=19 because 19 is the smallest prime p such that 2*29*p+1 is prime.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = p=2; while(!isprime(2*n*p+1), p = nextprime(p+1)); p; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 10 2013
